resources.string: The small x in the top right corner will open up a menu that provides an option to exit the game whenever you want.
The image buttons are abilities you can use to deal damage to the enemies. The numbers over them indicate that the ability is recharging before it may be used again.

To be able to start the level, you must first let your camera find a horizontal plane. This may take some time depending on the environment. The optimal environment is somewhere light (preferable inside), and the optimal plane has some contrast. The start level button will light up when a plane is found, and pressing it will begin the current level.

The colored rectangular area above your head is your health bar. Once the health bar turns completely black â€” you die. The black bar below the health bar is to keep track of your ultimate progress. Ultimates are powerful abilities that you gain access to, after using a certain amount of regular abilities that progressively fill up the ultimate bar.
